briefTitle: Clinical Usability of Nasal Glucagon in Treatment of Hypoglycemia in Children and Adolescents
officialTitle: A Multiple Center, Open Label, Prospective Study to Evaluate the Effectiveness and Ease-Of-Use of AMG504-1 Administered in the Home or School Environments for Treating Hypoglycemia in Children and Adolescents With T1D
summary: Up to fifty (50) children and adolescents with type 1 diabetes (T1D) aged 4 to Ë‚18 years at time of enrolment will be selected for inclusion in the study. The target is to obtain treatment response and user-experience data following use of Nasal Glucagon (LY900018) in treating episodes of hypoglycemia.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants Awakening or Returning to a Normal Status Within 30 Minutes Following Studied Drug of Administration
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Within 30 minutes after each drug administration for an episode of hypoglycemia
